raw_response: {"answer_index": 1, "answer_text": "Schenck Sporothrix (Sporothrix schenckii), a sinister and malevolent mold that is rumored to have the power to control the minds of those who inhale its spores.", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "Sporothrix schenckii is a well-known dimorphic fungus that causes subcutaneous mycosis known as sporotrichosis.
